Install
*******

This project is currently not hosted on pypi, so one has to
install it from source.

From Source
===========

After cloning the project install the requirements::

	python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt

Then install the package itself::

	python3 setup.py install


Building the Docs
=================

... Is done by by one line of code after installing the
package.::

	cd doc && make html
